episodes.title: Inside Edition's 1st Word of Faith Fellowship  investigation--1995
episodes.description: With the help of the Dallas based Trinity Foundation and their undercover mole--Pete Evans--Inside Edition 1st exposed this aberrant group in 1995.  Last year (22 years later),  after interviewing over 100 ex-members, the Associated Press has again exposed all these same practices and more--"AP Exclusive: Ex-congregants reveal years of ungodly abuse," by Mitch Weiss, Feb 27, 2017.

episodes.title: Inside Edition's 2nd Word of Faith (WOFF) Investigation, summer 1995
episodes.description: This show appeared on Inside Edition and was part of a continuing investigation into the Word of Faith Fellowship assisted by the Trinity Foundation in Dallas, TX.  One of the Foundation's investigators, Pete Evans, took a lot of hidden camera footage while investigating undercover inside the group.  In 2017, the Associated Press interviewed over a hundred ex-members about practices that were 1st exposed by Inside Edition in the mid-1990s and continue to this day.  Th AP investigation placed the Word of Faith Fellowship squarely back in the news. In this broadcast, you will see and hear some disturbing things, including Darren Lloyd  talking about his father Harold Lloyd's death inside the church.

episodes.title: Word of Faith Fellowship/Inside Edition
episodes.description:
Inside Edition and the Trinity Foundation expose abusive, cult-like
behavior in this sect known for it's "blasting" of demons--Feb 28, 1995
